Text: Please rip Restrepo - War documentary in 1080p...Thanks a Ton
In the description it says Resolution: 1920 x 1040 but the screen cap images are only 699 x 379. Which is correct?

The video is 1080p. Great quality for the size!

A/V:10/10
For Some Reason This Didnt Work So Well On My Computer, Was Jmpy As Hell, Picture And Audio Looked And Sounded Fine Tho

Way too low bitrate, severe block artifacting, brightness appears to be encoded in the 16-235 range rather than 0-255 yielding washed out colours and horrible contrast as well as no blacks. There also appears to be numerous broken keyframes.  If you're gonna encode shit in this low a bitrate then stick to 720p. 1080 res is just shooting yourself in the foot, especially with fail settings like the one used on your encoder.
V:3/A:8
